Particle size: The polymer/ャ-Al2O3-coated NCM622 sample showed no visible change to the morphology after calcination, indicating a uniform coating layer.
Particle shape: The SEM image showed that the polymer/ャ-Al2O3-coated NCM622 sample maintained its morphology, suggesting a smooth and continuous layer.
Particle distribution: The EDX analysis demonstrated an even distribution of aluminum, indicating a uniform coating of the ャ-Al2O3 layer on the particle surface.
Coating layer characteristics: The layer was around 7.8 nm on the particle surface, which was near to the theoretical value, demonstrating the uniform coating layer.
Crystal structure and lattice characteri: Rietveld refinement of the XRD patterns revealed that the Li/Ni cation disorder for the coated and uncoated NCM622 framework were both around 2.4%, proving that the coating process did not affect the structure of the pristine NCM material.
